channel.title: How can i do this,? slayer+
channel.description:
OK, so when new comers join my server how can they get auto- slayer xp? so its lvl 99 becuz i dnt think slayer works on deltascape source :o
any1 no how to?

item.title: How can i do this,? slayer+
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“WRX`, post:27, topic:248461”][quote author=legend-scape link=topic=327518.msg2564512#msg2564512 date=1228337243]

i am a good programer just cudent find the == starter thing

well i must be young to be your dad unless i got the wrong person?

You didnt know what the initialize was…

so, u probally dnt no wut ur mum looks like
[/quote]

Wow.
Classic example of a 10 year old’s “insult”?
Because he didn’t want to hear that he had to work to have a good skill…[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@WRX wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:20, topic:248461”][quote author=WRX` link=topic=327518.msg2564475#msg2564475 date=1228336344]

well ive check the client.java playerhandler.java and player.java and server.java and ive searched–> [quote]if (started == 0){[/quote] and it can’t find it :o,

(started == 0)

[/quote]

searched it cant find it so wtf? maybe its the source?? but u see same source as myn and they have auto slayer lvl 99 =[,[/quote]

All i can suggest now is learn your source more, then learn more java or just learn more of your sources functions, then you will figure it.

It’s no good if you can’t program anything.

item.title: How can i do this,? slayer+
item.dc:creator: @Prima Prima
item.description:
@Prima wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:14, topic:248461”][quote author=WRX` link=topic=327518.msg2564421#msg2564421 date=1228335017]

OK, so when new comers join my server how can they get auto- slayer xp? so its lvl 99 becuz i dnt think slayer works on deltascape source :o

any1 no how to?

Or you could make slayer yourself?

Right, search for:

if (started == 0){

Then, if you find that, underneath it add in:

addSkillXP(14000000, 18);

If you didn’t find that, post here and tell me.
[/quote]

wut files?? client.java???[/quote]

Do everything in the post before the one before this.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i do this,? slayer+
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

Prima, he may aswell search for Started first…

Since its a common one and would save wasting another slot in the save file

Also if he does that under:

addSkillXP(13400000, 18);

Should be a :

savegame(true);

or a:

savegame = true;

Read full topic
item.source: How can i do this,? slayer+

item.title: How can i do this,? slayer+
item.dc:creator: @Prima Prima
item.description:
@Prima wrote:

Declare this integer:

public int giveSlayerXP = 0;

Now add this to your saveMoreInfo() method:

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-slay = ", 0, 24); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(giveSlayerXP), 0, Integer.toString(giveSlayerXP).length());

And in your loadMoreInfo integer:

} else if (token.equals("character-slay")) { giveSlayerXP = Integer.parseInt(token2); }

Now in:

public void initialize() {

Above:

setSidebarInterface(1, 3917);

Add this:

if (giveSlayerXP == 0) { giveSlayerXP = 1; addSkillXP(13400000, 18); }

Save, compile and run.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i do this,? slayer+

item.title: How can i do this,? slayer+
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

Yeah but tony, may aswell add it under “started” if its there…then it will only have to set the skill level to 99 when they first login, and not every time they login.

Legend, read the second post of the thread.

Post back after,

Also, it works if you know how to program it in…
You just need to actually know how to do it lol.

All it is, basically is to add the skill xp when u killed an NPC, done in NPCHandler

Read full topic

item.title: How can i do this,? slayer+
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:8, topic:248461”][quote author=WRX` link=topic=327518.msg2564431#msg2564431 date=1228335268]

In the initializing method (public void initialize) add this:

addSkillXP(13400000, 18);

weres? [public void initialize] in client.java??

Player.java if you want it on login.

That will set it every time they login…
[/quote]
put it under the Initial Login? Haven’t been on 317s in a while…

OK, so when new comers join my server how can they get auto- slayer xp? so its lvl 99 becuz i dnt think slayer works on deltascape source :o

any1 no how to?

But yes, every skill on Delta works.[/quote]

ok but when i goto hit the lowest slayer xp npc it says u need 10slayer to fight this npc

Read full topic
